response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value for me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. I understand its significance to you, valued at $1,500,000. My proposal is to offer it to you at a special price of $1,250,000. This is a unique chance to secure a piece that not only meets but exceeds your expectations.

Please let me know if this offer aligns with your interests and budget. I am looking forward to the possibility of making this transaction and ensuring that both parties benefit from this exceptional collaboration.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1250000}
